name: Ainda Entre Nós
description:
A world where magic exists and humans and animals once lived in peace was destroyed by powerful magic. Seeking revenge, Enrique, a proud warrior, must defeat the four seals to free his land and family.

Looks incredible! But what if something is missing. What if the main character isn't Enrique at all. What if there is someone else that is more important than our hero

This game is developed in RPG Maker MV in 48 hours and was made for ImuneJam #1,  following the theme "You are not the main character"
